channel.title: How do you find hex value?
channel.description: So ive been wondering this forawhile because no one can seem to answer it, and i know one of my friend knows. How do u find the hex value of curses (the prayer style) and the hex value of normal prayer. You can also just tell me the value # if u can because this is bugging me. Thanks
